briefTitle: Promoting Early Detection of Breast Cancer in Rural Rwanda: Impact of Community Health Worker and Nurse Training
officialTitle: Promoting Early Detection of Breast Cancer in Rural Rwanda: Impact of a Community Health Worker and Health Center Nurse Training Program
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Community health workers or health center nurses affiliated with a designated intervention health center
* Interested in participating

Exclusion Criteria

* Not interested in participating
* Not available for training
